sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import search from '../../assets/search_icon.svg' import Avatar from '../../components/Avatar/Avatar' import Button from '../../components/Button/Button' import './Navbar.css' import { setCurrentUser } from '../../actions/currentUser' const Navbar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() var User = useSelector((state) => (state.currentUserReducer)) useEffect(() => { dispatch(setCurrentUser( JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Profile')))) },[dispatch]) return (
About Products For Teams
{ User == null ? Log in : <> {User.result.name} }
) } export default Navbar
